title: Netflix's You and the Rise of Stalkers
itunes:title: Netflix's You and the Rise of Stalkers
itunes:subtitle: Is Netflix’s portrayal of stalking... irresponsible?
description:
Madi and Aleena binge watched season 3 of Netflix's Original Series (well Madi actually binged watch the entire series) and this week have decided to dive into the world of Joe Goldberg and Love (brought to life by Penn Badgeley and Victoria Pedretti). We discuss his obsessive behaviors, what “makes” a stalker a stalker (aka does our social media “stalking” of old flings count?) and whether or not Netflix took their portrayal of stalking too far.



Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com
